attributes.action: ensure that the general taxpayer pays for the postage of parcels sent by families to forces serving in Iraq and Afghanistan, not other users of Royal Mail services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail should not be expected to pay for this and should not be able to pass the cost on to its other customers. The government sent soldiers to fight in those two countries: the users of Royal Mail did not.
